title: How to Care for 5 Days Old Chicks #business #chicken #homesteading

tasks.task: Feeding and caring for baby chickens
subtasks: Collecting and setting up a pan to hold baby chickens for the day
Ensuring baby chickens have access to clean water

tasks.task: Maintaining brooding area for baby chickens
subtasks: Monitoring temperature and ensuring warmth in the brooding area
Inspecting treated paper and replacing as needed
Providing ventilation and monitoring ammonia levels
Checking for signs of illness or distress in the chicks
Providing appropriate feed and ensuring adequate nutrition
Cleaning the brooding area daily to prevent disease and odor buildup
Checking for active movement and vocalization in chicks
Assessing overall health and well-being of the chicks
Ensuring chicks have enough space and moving them if necessary
Checking for signs of overcrowding and adjusting as needed
